titles.title: For the relief of Michael Patrick McNamara and Thomas Parnell McNamara, Jr.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 5/25/1995--Introduced. Entitles two named Federal employees to: (1) competitive status; (2) have their appointments converted to unconditional career appointments; and (3) have their positions converted to Deputy U.S. Marshal positions. Provides for their retirement from Federal service.
